attributes.value:
Instructions:
Preheat the Oven:

Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Prepare the Corn Mixture:

In a large bowl, combine the corn kernels and melted butter.
Mix Wet Ingredients:

In a separate bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, whole milk, and eggs.
Combine Dry Ingredients:

In another bowl, mix the sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, black pepper, and nutmeg.
Combine All Ingredients:

Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, whisking continuously until smooth.
Stir in the corn mixture, cheddar cheese, bacon (if using), and chopped chives.
Bake:

Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Serve:

Let the corn pudding cool slightly before serving. Garnish with additional chives if desired.
